title:
KYBO 3.0.0
***Romance***
Fifty Shades of Grey (2015)
http://cdni.condenast.co.uk/720x1080/d_f/Fifty-Shades-of-Grey-Film-t_720x1080.jpg http://images6.fanpop.com/image/photos/33800000/fifty-shades-of-grey-fifty-shades-trilogy-33869300-1920-1200.jpg Literature student Anastasia Steele's life changes forever when she meets handsome, yet tormented, billionaire Christian Grey.
The Fault in Our Stars (2014) http://144.76.186.45/r57/5/tyler/movie/TheFaultinOurStarsDVD-TylerMovieLand.mp4 http://37.media.tumblr.com/ed76b0b17b8d489c61d0daa3fae7f262/tumblr_mydouiYnl31sfevmio2_500.jpg http://www.pastapadre.com/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2014/01/thefaultinourstars.jpg Two teens, both who have different cancer conditions, fall in love after meeting at a cancer support group.
Blended (2014) http://144.76.186.45/r57/5/tyler/movie/BlendedDVD-TylerMovieLand.mp4 http://a5.mzstatic.com/us/r30/Video1/v4/04/68/41/04684126-543a-5e63-908d-5c2f72b29efa/poster212x312.jpeg http://cdn2-www.craveonline.com/assets/uploads/2014/05/Blended-2014-Movie.jpg Recently divorced mom Lauren (Drew Barrymore) and widowed dad Jim (Adam Sandler) let their friends push them into a blind date, which goes disastrously wrong. Unsurprisingly, neither wants to see the other ever again. However, fate intervenes when both Jim and Lauren, unbeknown to each other, purchase one-half of the same vacation package at a South African resort; they and their children are forced to share the same suite and participate in a slew of family activities together.
Romeo and Juliet (2014)
http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/51dsfF5JLXL.jpg http://i.ytimg.com/vi/mu-lMzHSNNk/maxresdefault.jpg Orlando Bloom and Condola Rashad take on the title characters in a modern adaptation of the timeless classic, Romeo and Juliet. This Broadway stage production is being broadcast in movie theaters.
Dirty Dancing (1987)
http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/0/00/Dirty_Dancing.jpg http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/1/13/Dirty-dancing-coverx-large.jpg Spending the summer in a holiday camp with her family, Frances "Baby" Houseman falls in love with the camp's dance instructor Johnny Castle.
